data.text: @_johnbye Well yeah because this shit is DANGEROUS and should not be administered to anyone! It clearly states in the majority of the ingredients of ALL the vaccines “not for human or animal consumption. Research purposes only.” Stop trying to murder children!!!!

@_johnbye @dgurdasani1 Why do I only ever get this info from twitter?
Rhetorical question.

@_johnbye Never really got homeopathy.

By it's "logic" all water I drink contains the memory of someone else's pee...

The CCVAG letter itself cites amongst other "evidence" a fraudulent paper written by HART members, which falsely claims that vaccines caused a (totally fictitious) spike in deaths and suggests the ONS is lying about how it reports deaths to cover this up!

https://t.co/pWT03ZeBqZ

They frequently share content from US anti-vax group Children's Health Defense and are fans of Simone Gold (arrested for taking part in the US Capitol riots).

Closer to home, they call a creep pestering kids outside schools and handing out fake NSPCC leaflets a "living legend". https://t.co/K3big2fa4O

The CCVAG is backed by the Children's Union, which calls clinical trials "recruiting children for experimentation".

They previously claimed "vaccine shedding" (not a real thing) caused periods in toddlers, compared covid passes to Nazi Germany, and made jokes about paedophilia. https://t.co/UOFEj2sfYS
